short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion app of CVBot that helps fill job applications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The CVBot Chrome Extension is your ultimate job application assistant, designed to make your job search more efficient and stress-free. Seamlessly integrated with CVBot.in, our free CV builder, this extension pulls your personalised resume directly from our database and displays them conveniently in the extension's popup.

But that’s not all! The CVBot Chrome Extension also streamlines your application process by automatically pre-filling job applications with your CV data across supported websites. Say goodbye to repetitive form-filling and hello to a faster, smarter job hunt.

Key Features:

Instant Data Access
View your mini CV directly in the extension popup.

Auto-Fill Applications
Automatically pre-fill job application forms with your resume information.

Seamless Integration
Connects effortlessly with your CVBot account for real-time data syncing.

Easy to Use
Enable the extension on job application sites with just one click.

Whether you’re applying to multiple jobs or just want to keep your CV details handy, the CVBot Chrome Extension is here to simplify your job search journey.

Download now and take the hassle out of job applications!
